entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 p.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
